title: Hodge theory, algebraic cycles of hyper-K\"ahler manifolds
abstract:
This thesis is devoted to the study of algebraic cycles in projective
hyper-K\"ahler manifolds and strict Calabi-Yau manifolds. It contributes to the
understanding of Beauville's and Voisin's conjectures on the Chow rings of
projective hyper-K\"ahler manifolds and strict Calabi-Yau manifolds. It also
studies some birational invariants of projective hyper-K\"ahler manifolds.
